title: Eli's Jeruselum Grill
typeOfFood: Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family owned and uses Israeli recipes. Offers a vegetarian plate that has hummus, falafel, pita bread, baba ghanoush, tabouli salad, red cabbage salad, and choice of rice or couscous. Carrot salad can be substituted for the red cabbage salad to make vegan. Also offer a roasted pepper salad, lentil soup, french fries, baklava, knafeh, and a beet salad. Each of the items can also be ordered a la carte. Items on menu are labeled vegetarian or gluten-free -- specify if vegan when ordering.
